channel.title: Robots on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 3 Best Robot Lawn Mowers (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These roving robots are expensive alternatives to some good old-fashioned yard work, but they’re finally good enough to consider if you’d rather sip an iced tea and watch the robot go by.

item.title: This Robot Only Needs a Single AI Model to Master Humanlike Movements
item.description: Atlas, Boston Dynamics’ dancing humanoid, can now use a single model for walking and grasping—a significant step toward general-purpose robot algorithms.

item.title: This Robot Only Needs a Single AI Model to Master Humanlike Movements

item.title: ElliQ Review: An AI Companion Bot for Lonely Elders
item.description: The AI-powered ElliQ robot and smart display aim to improve life for older folks living alone.
